评论详情: I made the mistake of not checking the reviews on the item before buying. The color of the lighter stripes is so different from the picture. I might try dyeing it to see if it helps, but I'm still very disappointed.

Material is butter soft, it's not super thick, but plenty enough to not be see through or anything and will be nice and warm. This is a size small, shown on my 13 year old daughter who is 4'11" and has a slender build. She says it's soft and comfortable and encouraged me to leave a positive review. WHICH IS A LOT coming from a teenager!!

I dont even know what material this garment is. Not what i thought from the picture. Needed for halloween asap so i kept it, but sheesh. I would 100% not recommend this shirt. Looks very cheep and the “fuzzy” knit look is printed on. Size was fine. Color was fine. Price was high for this material, it is what makes this a 1 star, its srsly awful.

The fabric feels cheap. The colors are completely off. The lighter brown stripes are pinkish and cream colored. Looks nothing like the photo, not even the sleeve are similar. It’s not wide like the picture.
My daughter loves this blouse!

This is a somewhat stiff synthetic long sleeve shirt on the thin side. It was listed as a sweater. My daughter wanted to keep it for its appearance, which is a first for her, because she usually decides by whether the material feels good to the touch.
Doesn’t look like the picture and the material is pretty cheap, don’t buy:)
Im 5'3 145lb, and it fits me kind of weird. I have a wider frame so i feel like it would fit someone with a thinner/tinnier frame.
Poor quality, sweater was a shirt…
I had to return it because of so many things, it’s color was off, material felt itchy, didn’t feel like it was suppose to be a large, had to return immediately!

Its a lot more bright pink than in the pictures also like some other reviews were saying. It’s so tight on my arms it’s uncomfortable to bend them in it. I hope the fabric will stretch out but jeez it’s so bad. Material is fine.

it was itchy, and it was over sized, i’m not petite i’d say im average but the shirt was NOT fitted at all like the photos and it wasn’t even the same color. i should’ve looked at the reviews a bit closer before buying, i’d expect not much since it was a bit cheap, but for the price it is i didn’t expect it to not even be the same color. if you’re reading this and thinking about buying that brown and cream shirt thinking “oh it’ll look fitted n cute i’ll buy it”, don’t. it’s a waste of money once u see it’s not even the same color you ordered.
I bought this brown and cream sweater-looking shirt, only to receive a super short almost crop-top thin itchy fabric shirt that was pink and brown. It has been returned.
